item.title: Bert
item.description: For all translation problems, we suggest to try the Transformer model. https://tensorflow.google.cn/official_models/fine_tuning_bert the configuration, vocabulary, and a pre-trained checkpoint. you can find the download url for this in README.md page. BERT 可解释性-从"头"说起 一、背景介绍 搜索场景下用户搜索的 query 和
